name: Dig for treasure
prompt: You have a shovel and some treasure maps. Choose a site to dig
large: You found a treasure chest {choice}! Collect **{coins} coins.**
medium: You found some gold {choice}! Collect **{coins} coins.**
small: All you found was a shiny rock. Collect **{coins} coins.**

name: Invest in cryptocurrency
prompt: You won free cryptocurrency! Choose a coin
large: {choice} went to the moon! Collect **{coins} coins.**

name: Mine for diamonds
prompt: You got a diamond picaxe with Efficiency V! Where do you want to mine?
large: You found lots of diamonds mining {choice}! Collect **{coins} coins.**
medium: You found a few diamonds mining {choice}. Collect **{coins} coins.**
small: All you found mining {choice} was some coal. Collect **{coins} coins.**

name: Post a meme
prompt: What kind of meme do you want to post?
small: Your {choice} died in new. Collect **{coins} coins.**
